director.name: 约翰·阿卜杜勒-努尔 Yohann Abdelnour

this_title: A Bad Day to Pick Carrots
introduction: In an imaginary world, Momo and Mimi are two little white rabbits that live together. Their home is a tree house, located in a vast landscape full of green hills. One day, Momo leaves the tree house. Little does he know things will go wrong upon his return, as Mimi accidentally takes a bite of an evil carrot-parasite.
chinese_title: A Bad Day to Pick Carrots
